
Two careless admins generated RSA keys with overlapping primes. Intercept the message encrypted as ciphertext1: 5529366026307182796489643387719480503676038276911447658614853474143159217084292690839198353563192738445559968777558628431807533102357856602928414700504775, ciphertext2: 1011078017104258317969655006530000733012282191547155436844105083252674435510006170872240320712919092948642857173151796887786632584400820152991758845941636 by exploiting their shared factor blunder.


The flag format is flag{...}
n1=5876766681003989760014540163581731719882946991472856365279293011050532590370316834177275223688115559215749996817102517683515977442123615114909455779473019, n2=4682271826070107684068630344723222571557502421137649944248314226581587563583068617018496793699076838765357744691829816873500110557994984126048604033670591, e=2249866671196047257361684419234836519381545495109086952997569183884906759685489399151175792845606672861888597723496661276744742903161979617952495472401369

---

## Challenge Technical Details
flag: flag{m3xf9vv1}
cipher: RSA
ciphertext: ciphertext1: 5529366026307182796489643387719480503676038276911447658614853474143159217084292690839198353563192738445559968777558628431807533102357856602928414700504775, ciphertext2: 1011078017104258317969655006530000733012282191547155436844105083252674435510006170872240320712919092948642857173151796887786632584400820152991758845941636
vulnerability: common factors
hint: When two RSA moduli share a common factor, computing GCD(n1, n2) can reveal the shared prime factor.
necessary_info: The flag format is flag{...}
n1=5876766681003989760014540163581731719882946991472856365279293011050532590370316834177275223688115559215749996817102517683515977442123615114909455779473019, n2=4682271826070107684068630344723222571557502421137649944248314226581587563583068617018496793699076838765357744691829816873500110557994984126048604033670591, e=2249866671196047257361684419234836519381545495109086952997569183884906759685489399151175792845606672861888597723496661276744742903161979617952495472401369
extra_info: p=77369717604184137419467498330282374410470855672185841007024986074819913269193, q=75956935904418701177070956865360055379421813101920302576004732295596713410083, r=61643769200512501038673880455319597473322112674905518951229987160880340567477, φ(n1)=5876766681003989760014540163581731719882946991472856365279293011050532590370163507523766620849519020760554354387312625014741871298540585396539039152793744, φ(n2)=4682271826070107684068630344723222571557502421137649944248314226581587563582931016313391862496861093928037065038977072947723284736467749406592126979693032
subtype: common_factors
archetype: rsa
